metadata.title: CVE-2024-2312 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GRUB2 does not call the module fini functions on exit, leading toDebian/Ubuntu's peimage GRUB2 module leaving UEFI system table hooks afterexit. This lead to a use-after-free condition, and could possibly lead tosecure boot bypass.

criterions.comment: grub2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
